name: um-react-electron
description: Unlock Music 音乐解锁 (React) Electron App
author: dreamfly

scripts.dev: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../ && electron .
scripts.start: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../ && electron .
scripts.build: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../
scripts.build:win: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../ && electron-builder --win --config
scripts.build:mac: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../ && electron-builder --mac --config
scripts.build:linux: cd um-react && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../src/renderer && cd ../ && electron-builder --linux --config
